io.druid.indexing.overlord

Class TaskMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.druid.indexing.overlord.TaskMaster

  • public class TaskMaster
extends Object
    Encapsulates the indexer leadership lifecycle.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts waiting for leadership. Should only be called once throughout the life of the program.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops forever (not just this particular leadership session). Should only be called once throughout the life of the program.
